hero.title: Dinnartec
hero.tagline: Innovating the future, improving the present.
hero.description: We are a technology company that builds solutions with AI to optimize businesses and create products that scale globally.

about.label: 01 — About
about.title: What is Dinnartec?
about.description: Dinnartec is a technology company founded by developers with one goal: build solutions that transform industries.
about.content: We are not a traditional agency. We are builders who combine technical execution with strategic thinking. We were born with the mindset of great tech companies, understanding that the path is built step by step.

pillarItems.name: Development
pillarItems.description: We build software with technical excellence

pillarItems.name: Investigation
pillarItems.description: We explore new technologies and methodologies

pillarItems.name: Innovation
pillarItems.description: We create original solutions to real problems

pillarItems.name: Adaptation
pillarItems.description: We evolve with the market and its needs

pillarItems.name: Revolution
pillarItems.description: We transform industries, not just participate

pillarItems.name: Technology
pillarItems.description: Our core, our tool, our medium

solutions.label: 02 — Services
solutions.subtitle: We optimize businesses with technology and AI.
solutions.description: We identify inefficiencies, design strategies, and implement solutions that generate real impact: more revenue, lower costs, greater efficiency.
solutions.tagline: We don't sell hours. We sell results.

diagnosis.title: Diagnosis
diagnosis.description: We analyze your business to identify high-impact opportunities

sprint.title: Optimization Sprint
sprint.description: We execute concrete solutions in short cycles (2-4 weeks)

support.title: Ongoing Support
support.description: We maintain, adjust, and improve implemented solutions

factory.label: 03 — Products
factory.subtitle: Our proprietary products vertical.
factory.description: The best products don't come from ideas — they come from real friction.
factory.content: Factory takes the patterns we detect while solving problems and turns them into independent products that scale globally.

labs.label: 04 — Research
labs.subtitle: Our research and development vertical.
labs.description: We explore the future of technology to build tomorrow's present.
labs.content: Labs is where we experiment with emerging technologies, develop internal capabilities, and prepare the innovations that will define our next products and services.

experimental.title: Experimental Projects
experimental.description: Prototypes and proof of concepts exploring new technological possibilities

emerging.title: Emerging Technologies
emerging.description: Research in advanced AI, blockchain, quantum computing, and more

capabilities.title: Internal Capabilities
capabilities.description: Development of tools and methodologies that enhance our work

contact.label: 05 — Contact
contact.title: Let's build something together
contact.description: Have a project in mind? Want to optimize your business? Let's talk.

footer.tagline: Innovating the future, improving the present.
